subject: Re: [junit] Nagios plugin
msgSnippet: ... You may want to have a look at http://cruisecontrol.sourceforge.net or http://www.urbancode.com/projects/anthill/default.jsp for the automation of building
messageBody:
Rod Gonzaga wrote:

> I am interested in running automatic periodic tests using JUnit and
> Nagios. Has anyone had experience with this? Perhaps a Nagios plugin
> already exists to integrate JUnit testing?

You may want to have a look at http://cruisecontrol.sourceforge.net or
http://www.urbancode.com/projects/anthill/default.jsp for the automation
of building and unit testing.

--
Alexander Rupsch
http://www.dreinhalb.de
